critical.suggestion: Remova ou renomeie as declaracoes duplicadas

fixability.manual_steps:
1. Identifique qual declaracao manter
2. Remova ou renomeie as duplicatas
3. Atualize referencias

examples: cli: 'init' declarado em ai.go, template.go, version.go

code_contexts.code_snippet:
39 | 		cmd.Println("Template created")
    40 | 		return nil
    41 | 	},
    42 | }
    43 | 
‚Üí   44 | func init() {
    45 | 	rootCmd.AddCommand(templateCmd)
    46 | 	templateCmd.AddCommand(templateListCmd)
    47 | 	templateCmd.AddCommand(templateCreateCmd)
    48 | 	templateCreateCmd.Flags().StringP("name", "n", "", "Template name")
    49 | 	templateCreateCmd.MarkFlagRequired("name")
code_contexts.full_function:
func init() {
	rootCmd.AddCommand(templateCmd)
	templateCmd.AddCommand(templateListCmd)
	templateCmd.AddCommand(templateCreateCmd)
	templateCreateCmd.Flags().StringP("name", "n", "", "Template name")
	templateCreateCmd.MarkFlagRequired("name")
}
